title: Dolly used in young adult fantasy novels
content:
I was at a bookstore the other day here in the US and I noticed that The Mortal Instruments, a series of young adult fantasy novels by Cassandra Clare, are all set in [Dolly](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106084828/http:/vllg.com/Underware/Dolly/mudTyper+Weights/). It looks absolutely lovely in a fictional book setting, nice and dark on the page.

[http://www.mortalinstruments.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106084828/http:/www.mortalinstruments.com/ "http://www.mortalinstruments.com/")

Rahim
author: RahimSnow
